ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: What are you doing mentioning it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: What do you have to do with explaining it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: What concern do you have to speak about that?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), you do not know (when and how) it will come.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: What concern do you have regarding its explanation? (You are not bound to tell them)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: What do you have to mention of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: About what! You are one to remind of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What art thou about, to mention it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Why (ask they)? What hast thou to tell thereof?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: what have you to do with the mentioning of it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherein art thou concerred with the declaration thereof!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: considering your frequent mention of it?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Wherein art thou (concerned) with the declaration thereof?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: You have no knowledge to say anything about it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But how are you to know?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You have no knowledge of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: In what [position] are you that you should mention it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:43] What have you to do with the mention of it?, in other words, you have no knowledge of it in order to mention it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 729 (Why (ask they)? What hast thou to tell thereof?) What has it to do with you that you should mention it to them?
